promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a gigantic special dragon water-type pokemon wearing a sapphire crown. It can be found in lake-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or dragon. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Crownquatic, a a gigantic special dragon water-type pokemon. It can be found in lake-like environments It has the following abilities: Destructive Whirlpool. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "dragon", "water" or "Crownquatic". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, dragon-like, special, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, aurora background
generatedDescription: This royal leviathan rules over its aquatic realm with its Destructive Whirlpool. It's known for occasionally causing massive waves.
